description: Kazari`s Lilligant is a Pok√©mon Performer who was attempting to help Kazari become the Kalos Queen. It was first seen participating in the first round of the theme performances against Serena at the Frey Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. It lost the round and was therefore eliminated from the tournament due to the fact it wasn`t able to attract enough of the Sihorn and Serena`s experience with Sihorn.
name: Dredear (Kazari)
